reviewtext: Two relatives still have multiple VCRs and they tape a lot of stuff.  Tapes wear out over time so I buy them new tapes once a year or so.  These tapes are a very good price and last for a long time even though my Mom and aunt tape over them maybe hundreds of times in a year.  I have never gotten a "bad" tape or had tapes break.
summary: Yes, some folks do still have VHS recorders!  Good buy.
